AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States Magistrate Judge: court official responsible for the report and recommendation
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States Border Patrol: conducted a vehicle stop as part of an investigation into human smuggling, operated the Freer immigration checkpoint, noticed drop-offs on Farm-to-Market Road 2050 to avoid checkpoints, monitors traffic on Farm-to-Market Road 2050 which is mostly used by ranchers and oil field workers, followed suspicious vehicles
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Freer Police Department: conducted a traffic stop that led to an arrest and subsequent motion to suppress
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States District Court: court where motions to suppress were filed and heard
